summary:
Well... IT\'S PORTAL TIME 2.0!!!
#And a letter from GLaDOS, of course, but from GLaDOS 2.0!
#Setup the Turregnus System!!!(Turret+Magnus)
#Meet your new partner \"Weight Companion Cube\"!
#Newly \"Borrowed\" items/animations/dialogboxes!!!
descriptionHtml:
It seems this mod is more popular in Steam, if anyone dig this mod up here you should also check the Steam site, more Q&A, more pictures:
   http://steamcommunity.com/id/dreames/myworkshopfiles?appid=72850
The file is updated every time, but picture looks better in Steam(and more)

 [A HUGE 2.0 UPDATE is here, Wait no longer!]

 Well... IT\'S PORTAL TIME 2.0!!!
 #And a letter from GLaDOS, of course, but from GLaDOS 2.0!
 #Setup the Turregnus System!!!(Turret+Magnus)
 #Meet your new partner \"Weight Companion Cube\"!
 #Newly \"Borrowed\" items/animations/dialogboxes!!!

 A plugin that brings half of the PORTAL FUN to skyrim! But wait, why half of it? No levels inside!

 >The 2.0 letter is placed in Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn, as always. And I put the spell In ALTERATION class.

 For anyone wanting to see this in action(Thanks Preykousis)
 v1.0:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cWS8e3PVA4M


 Look what I\'ve done in 2.0: 
 >Companion Cube Added! An important partner(to be throw away)
 >Setup the Turregnus piece by piece, no kidding!
 >Choose which TYPE of Portal you wanted to use:
  Short Duration low cost...
  Middle Duration mid cost?
  Forever, Portal further and high cost, of course!
 >Switch between three types at the Turregnus System!
 >A Short-trip-across-map to get Turregnus set, equip your Portal, I suggest.



Look what I\'ve done(in 1.0):
 >Two Fully Functional Portals!
 >Anything alive(or seems alive) can be portaled!

 >Open one, no effect; open both, Portals!
 >New open, old closed!
 >Each Portal placed last 1200second(In the script I made, or 20min), if no new portal comes out

 >Walk near the center of the portal, and you get portaled!
 >When Portaled out, you(or something else) will face the place you casted this portal
 >The place you come out is Next To the Portal(if not that way, you are trapped for 1200second)
  [ON 2.0 UPDATE THIS IS CHANGED]

 >Well... It seems unable to portal some enemys across the map and beat them with your \"friends\" in town

 >No object, animations or something else is left on the map, after lots of travels(As far as I know...)
 >The \"Unlimited Falling\" in Portal can be performed... But each fall counts(HAS DAMAGE-First on the ground, then portaled)
 >In the 1st Person View, you will not experience \"The Falling(to Death if high enough)\"
 >About the FPS... Short trip-no(I can\'t feel); Mid trip-A little; Long trip-Loading Screen XD

 This is the first plugin I made with Scripts! Rate, Subscribe or Favorite, if you like it!

[In Steam Workshop]
 And I should thank Jaxonz and his \"Jaxonz Blink Teleport Spell\", a great example for \"Teleportion Spells\". This is why I started to learn the P-script(Papyrus).

 [First I want to make a Tele-spell,then I found Jaxonz\'s. So I decide to make this one instead |||| What? Someone in Nexus made a portal too... Well... sadly his portal looks more portal: search Portal by Alex Ducey... Anyway, I think that makes mine more Skyrim, mine is not bad, after all]

UPDATE 1.01 \"Horse Problem\" Solved
UPDATE 2.0 Turregnus, Companion Cube, Letters&Books added
UPDATE 2.01 More Hints added in Letters&Books
UPDATE 2.02 You can\'t move the Letters&Books now, fight freely
UPDATE 2.03 Keep User Guide until get F-Portal; unchecked \"Respawn\"(If it matters)
author: Dr_Eames

files.changelogHtml: All the .bsa file have source-script included, so if you want to take a look, or make a change, go for it!
